content.p: Find out all you need to know about assessment centres plus read about three key activities you've asked us to focus on. Explore what happens at an assessment centre including videos and tips Read about presentation tasks, what to expect and how to prepare Group exercises are a popular task at assessment centres, find out more Prepare for case study tasks with our tips and advice telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
